name: Bubble Harrier
description:
# Bubble Harrier

a game where you need to leap over obstacles or shoot them to get as far as you can

## Screenshot
![Screenshot](screenshots/screenshot.png)

## How to play

Keyboard                | Action
----------------------- | ------------
W    | Jump
A  | Move left
D | Move right
Shift        | Shoot

## Source

The source code is available publicly here:

https://github.com/andresattler/bubble_harrier
